title: River Current
original_name: リバーカレント; 流動的河川
sinopse:
Six months ago Nao was working as a prostitute in a love hotel until Washio asked him to model for and live with him. Washio has taught Nao the real pleasure in making love. But Washio stopped making love to him two months ago!! Nao is getting very insecure.

(Source: MU)
